author: Staff Reporter
text:
Election officials displayed awareness boards in commercial establishments, trade houses and textile shops to propagate the importance of voting and democratic rights of citizens here on Monday.

“Our main aim was to achieve cent per cent polling in the assembly election,” said Collector T.N. Hariharan while displaying a signboard in a textile shop on Monday morning.

Awareness campaign was intensified at railway stations, bus stands, market places and function spots in the district. Later, women at Chennamanaickanpatti took an oath to cast their votes without fail.
title: Importance of voting stressed
